name: Snake Ball
description:
Two player soccer with snakes!

This is what happens when you combine Pong with Snake. A friend is required.

How to play

Push balls into the area matching the color of your snake (green to green and orange to orange). First player to score 10 balls wins the round. There are 4 rounds - each on a different map.

Hold the sprint button to go faster and become longer for a short time. But be careful! When you sprint your snake slowly shrinks. Eat powerups to restore your length.

Controls:

  • gamepads (recommended): left joystick + a
  • keyboard:
    • wasd+shift (player 1)
    • arrows+space (player 2)
  • more details in readme.txt

Tested with Xbox One gamepads but should work with any device.

Future

I may keep developing it further so stay tuned. Feel free to leave feedback in the comments!
